extendedInfo.description: AlmostTI turns your Android device into a Texas Instruments graphing calculator. It fully emulates TI-84+, TI-84+ Silver Edition, TI-83+, TI-83+ Silver Edition, TI-73, TI-83, TI-85, TI-86, TI-82, and TI-81 calculators made by Texas Instruments. And yes, if you have got a tablet, it will become a really BIG TI calculator. AlmostTI also lets you save your calculations at any point and then select from several previously saved tasks.To run AlmostTI, you will need at least one calculator system ROM. AlmostTI does not include any calculator ROMs on its own, as they are intellectual property of Texas Instruments. You should place your own ROM, preferably dumped from the calculator you own, onto your internal storage. AlmostTI recognizes following ROM files (in upper or lower case):TI85.ROM, TI86.ROM, TI81.ROM, TI82.ROM, TI73.ROM, TI83.ROM, TI83P.ROM, TI83SE.ROM, TI84P.ROM, TI84SE.ROMTI-85.ROM, TI-86.ROM, TI-81.ROM, TI-82.ROM, TI-73.ROM, TI-83.ROM, TI-83P.ROM, TI-83SE.ROM, TI-84P.ROM, TI-84SE.ROMFor information on dumping a ROM from your own calculator, see here:http://www.ticalc.org/programming/emulators/For general information about AlmostTI, see its homepage:http://fms.komkon.org/ATI85/For Android-specific help, please see this web page:http://fms.komkon.org/EmuAndroid/And to discuss your problems with the author and other users, use this discussion group:http://groups.google.com/group/emul8

reviews.title: It is ok, but...
reviews.comment: Touch key responses fails and requires to hold in order to respond. It is annoying to use this application and I just don\'t remove it because I need it for college. I hope it gets fixed and perhaps I would give 3 stars. To worsen, installing it is a pain. I have the HP48GX emulator installed with outstanding results and did not have to pay for. HTC Vivid
reviews.author: Lucio Da Silva

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Nice to have my ti with me all the time!  There is a bug with this on a galaxy s3 lte, the debugger is always up when you open up a ti83pse and you cant close it so you cant use the calculator. Works fine on my note 2
reviews.author: Antony Barton

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work until you download...
reviews.comment: ... program / emulator.   I paid for and downloaded the app while at work... then got busy and my 15 min refund window lapsed. I would have asked for a refund otherwise.
reviews.author: Brian Allen

reviews.title: Tricky to install but worth the effort
reviews.comment: You can\'t just download the app and then run it. You also need to transfer your calculator\'s ROM file to your phone too and that can be tricky. But once you finally get it right this is a great app. All the power of your TI graphing calculator right there on your phone. That\'s awesome!
reviews.author: Douglas Hendricks

reviews.title: It won\'t work on mobile
reviews.comment: I\'m on a mobile phone and I bought this app so I didn\'t have to use a calc. But it says I need a calc to use the app?? Don\'t buy.
reviews.author: Aiden McGeehan

reviews.title: Decent functionality
reviews.comment: The F1-F5 keys aren\'t working for the ti 84 plus se
reviews.author: Quinten Duong

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Andie graph is very helpful and free but ui was very outdated and drained battery fast, and it does not support 84+ se!! But this app does!! Why spend hundreds of dollars on calculators! Just five bucks and you\'re set with all of ti\'s calculators!! Must buy!!
reviews.author: Danny Loera

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: Difficult to figure out how to find and download roms but once you do that, it\'s a really nice and solid application.
reviews.author: Mohammad Haider

reviews.title: Not working for with TI-84P
reviews.comment: Displays screen but none of the functions work for TI-84P shows a debugger screen. Will request a refund.
reviews.author: Cornell Freeman

reviews.title: Strange toast notification
reviews.comment: I continue to get a notification that says \"touch above calculator to open menu\".  I\'m assuming it\'s talking about the menu for the calculator selector?!  The only option in the menu is \"scan for roms\".  I have downloaded a TI-84 plus rom and named it as instructed, yet it doesn\'t work.  Would be fantastic if I could figure out what it\'s wanting me to do.
reviews.author: Tony Clark

reviews.title: Good app but...
reviews.comment: This app is nice, but F1-F5 (alpha + y=, alpha + window etc...) doesn\'t work like my physical  calculator (ti-84 plus silver edition).  For the cost of this app this isn\'t acceptable.  I really depend on these functions for the templates associated.  Update and I\'ll give 5 stars!  Thanks.
reviews.author: Victor Sanchez

reviews.title: Perfect!!
reviews.comment: This is the best money spent on a app yet!
reviews.author: Mark Robinson

reviews.title: Excellent app!
reviews.comment: I purchased this a couple of weeks ago as a way to do math from my tablet and not carry my ti84. It also provided me a   to preserve my favorite calc ever: the ti85 my parents gave me as a freshman in college in the very early 90s. Now my ROM lives forever. It is one excellent tool. BTW the developer is also excellent. I was stuck on getting the ROM so I emailed and took just a few minutes to reply with help.  .
reviews.author: Diego J. Diaz

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: This is a great app.  I was able to put all the calculators I collected through high school and engineering school in one place!  It works perfectly.  I do wish it supported my TI-89, though.
reviews.author: Jonathan Bluff

reviews.title: Nice app!
reviews.comment: Does this calculator app support installing TI-Basic games and programs like Graph 89 does? If so, I am unable to figure out how.
reviews.author: Stian Ervik Wahlv\303\245g

reviews.title: Physical calculator needed before purchasing app
reviews.comment: I haven\'t been able to use this $6 app because I dont have ROMs. I was unaware that I needed that from a physical calculator before downloading the app. Well, now I have no calculator, no calc. emulator, and I dont have $6. I wonder if I could get a reimbursement.
reviews.author: Kisakye Edwards

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Flawless. Please keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Kei Landin

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: Every time I open the TI84 rom it crashes. Originally purchased the rom because it was the only one that actually supported the TI 84se rom. I would have gotten a refund but my phone was too busy resetting.   Well played.
reviews.author: Victr Cha

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Had an issue, contacted developer, promptly got back with me and issue was fixed. App works fantastic.
reviews.author: Chris whoknows
